definitions: An alcohol present in the bark of the white quebracho, Aspidosperma quebracho-blanco, and obtained commercially from the latex of the rubber tree, Hevea brasiliensis, used in the synthesis of pharmaceuticals.

notes.text: Quebrachitol is a cyclic, pentahydric alcohol: 2-0-methyl-chiro-inositol, C₇H₁₄O₆.
